LOGIN.TITLE: Production-Ready Authentication
LOGIN.SUBTITLE: JWT-based secure authentication flow
LOGIN.DESCRIPTION: This application implements a production-grade authentication system with JWT tokens, featuring both Angular Guards and Spring Boot Security.

HOME.WELCOME: Welcome to Spring Boot Angular Playground!

FEATURES.JWT_AUTH: JWT Authentication: Stateless, secure token-based authentication
FEATURES.ROUTE_GUARDS: Angular Route Guards: Protect routes and redirect unauthorized users
FEATURES.INTERCEPTORS: HTTP Interceptors: Automatically attach JWT tokens to requests
FEATURES.SPRING_SECURITY: Spring Security: Server-side authentication and authorization
